title: Question about World Master Pass
body: If I am late to the party, like start from this moment, can I still get all the mission, enough to get the chrome, or only get the left?

replies.body: Ah, cutting it close!  >.<.  You won't be able to do previous weeks missions, which is why the pass price is reduced.  You'll only be able to participate in current and upcoming missions.  Sorry friend!
right now you are not able to get the chroma anymore, I am sorry for you
